mapper.select: select a.fund_code as "fundCode", a.fund_name as "fundName", to_char(a.fund_sdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "foundDate", b.organ_name as "registerName", c.organ_name as "handlerName", d.organ_name as "trusteeName", e.name as "fundType", f.name as "operMode", g.manager_name as "managerName" from fund_info a left join fund_organ_info b on a.fund_register=b.organ_code and b.edate=date'2199-12-31' left join fund_organ_info c on a.fund_handler=c.organ_code and c.edate=date'2199-12-31' left join fund_organ_info d on a.fund_trustee=d.organ_code and d.edate=date'2199-12-31' left join fund_param_code e on e.dict_code='fundType' and a.fund_type=e.code left join fund_param_code f on f.dict_code='fundType' and a.fund_oper_mode=f.code left join fund_manager_map h on a.fund_code=h.fund_code left join fund_manager_info g on h.fund_manager_id=g.id where a.fund_code=#{fundCode} and a.edate=date'2199-12-31'

select to_char(a.data_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "dataDate", round(a.fund_nuv + 0.00005, 4) as "netValue", round(a.fund_sum_nuv + 0.00005, 4) as "sumValue" from fund_net_value a where a.fund_code=#{fundCode}
AND a.data_date >= TO_DATE(#{dataDates},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND a.data_date <= TO_DATE(#{dataDatee},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY a.data_date desc
